LanguageData.GR_Elasmobearium.label: elasmobearium
LanguageData.GR_Elasmobearium.description: The Elasmobearium is a hybrid of a bear and the ancient ancestor of the rhinoceros. The Elasmobearium is a pretty aggressive omnivore, using its horn to impale its victims and then mauling them with their vicious paws.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All primary bear hybrids have stun attacks. Aside from obviously being a very powerful creature, they produce a wool of excellent quality.
LanguageData.GR_Elasmobearium.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_Elasmobearium.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_Elasmobearium.tools.3.label: horn
LanguageData.GR_Elasmobearium_Corpse.label: elasmobearium corpse
LanguageData.GR_Boomnotherium.label: boomnotherium
LanguageData.GR_Boomnotherium.description: The Boomnotherium is an hybrid between a boomalope and a large prehistoric relative of modern-day elephants. In latin, boomnotherium roughly translates as "terrible beast that will explode in your ass".\n\nUseful abilities: Boomnotheriums produce huge amounts of chemfuel, and they are "tanky", able to withstand a lot of abuse before exploding.
LanguageData.GR_Boomnotherium.tools.0.label: tusk
LanguageData.GR_Boomnotherium.tools.1.label: left foot
LanguageData.GR_Boomnotherium.tools.2.label: right foot
LanguageData.GR_Boomnotherium.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Boomnotherium_Corpse.label: boomnotherium corpse
LanguageData.GR_Chickenlodon.label: chickenlodon
LanguageData.GR_Chickenlodon.description: The chickenlodon is a very weird cross between one of the most fearsome predators ever existing... and a chicken. A saber-toothed chicken, if you will.
LanguageData.GR_Chickenlodon.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_Chickenlodon.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_Chickenlodon_Corpse.label: chickenlodon corpse
LanguageData.GR_Mantistanis.label: mantistanis
LanguageData.GR_Mantistanis.description: Mixing the genes of one of the biggest carnivorous birds ever existing and those of a praying mantis is either a genious idea, or anathema. The Mantistanis stalks its prey by standing incredibly still and launching itself to attack with lightning speed.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All insectoid hybrids have good armor and no toxic sensitivity, but they are always sterile and can't reproduce, even if a fertility booster is used to create them. Slight regenerative properties.
LanguageData.GR_Mantistanis.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.GR_Mantistanis.tools.1.label: mantis blades
LanguageData.GR_Mantistanis.tools.2.label: mantis blades
LanguageData.GR_Paraceramuffalo.label: paraceramuffalo
LanguageData.GR_Paraceramuffalo.description: The Paraceratherium was the biggest land mammal to ever exist. When you hibridize it with a sturdy muffalo, the resulting creature is the most powerful pack animal ever created. Incredibly stubborn and bad-tempered, though.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Produces wool and milk, and acts as an incredibly strong -albeit slow- pack beast.
LanguageData.GR_Paraceramuffalo.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.GR_Paraceramuffalo.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.GR_Paraceramuffalo_Corpse.label: paraceramuffalo corpse
LanguageData.GR_Lizardochs.label: lizardochs
LanguageData.GR_Lizardochs.description: The lizardochs is basically a reptilian bull, an hybrid between a lizard and the ancestor of domesticated cattle. The lizardochs needs little substenance to survive, at least for a creature of its size, and can be used as a pack animal, which makes it ideal to use in caravans through warm and dry lands such as deserts.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All reptile hybrids have good temperature tolerance ranges and venomous attacks. Produces milk, and acts as a pack animal that needs little food.
LanguageData.GR_Lizardochs.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.GR_Lizardochs.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.GR_Lizardochs.tools.2.label: horn
LanguageData.GR_Lizardochs.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Lizardochs_Leather.label: lizardochs leather
LanguageData.GR_Lizardochs_Corpse.label: lizardochs corpse
LanguageData.GR_Doedicoon.label: doedicoon
LanguageData.GR_Doedicoon.description: This armoured rodent is an hybrid of a raccoon and a Doedicurus. The Doedicoon breeds fast, and its armor can be useful in the frontlines.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All rodent hybrids have fast gestation, as long as a fertility unblocker was used when creating them in the genomorpher. Armoured rodent
LanguageData.GR_Doedicoon.tools.0.label: tail
LanguageData.GR_Doedicoon.tools.1.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_Doedicoon.tools.2.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_Doedicoon_Leather.label: doedicoon leather
LanguageData.GR_Doedicoon_Corpse.label: doedicoon corpse
LanguageData.GR_Thrumdraeodon.label: thrumdraeodon
LanguageData.GR_Thrumdraeodon.description: A huge, boar-like animal that will eat anything on its path. Thrumdraedons are cunning and resourceful.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All colossal hybrids have very slow attacks, but hit very hard, and possess natural armor. Keen senses ability: Twice a day, the Thrumdraeodon can activate an ability that gives it increased awareness of its surreoundings.
LanguageData.GR_Thrumdraeodon.tools.0.label: horn
LanguageData.GR_Thrumdraeodon.tools.1.label: left hoof
LanguageData.GR_Thrumdraeodon.tools.2.label: right hoof
LanguageData.GR_Thrumdraeodon_Corpse.label: thrumdraeodon corpse
LanguageData.GR_WoolyWolf.label: wooly Wolf
LanguageData.GR_WoolyWolf.description: Just like Wooly Mammoths and Wooly Rhinos, the Wooly Wolf is a creature perfectly adapted to cold climates. Wooly wolves are an excellent source of high quality wool, since they produce it much faster than a mammoth.\n\nUseful abilities: Fast wool production
LanguageData.GR_WoolyWolf.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_WoolyWolf.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_WoolyWolf.tools.3.label: tusk
LanguageData.GR_WoolyWolf_Corpse.label: wooly Wolf corpse
